item.title: Store Grand Open
item.description: Chao Chen opened this bakery with joy.

item.title: About
item.description: Fresh Baked Bread Discover the exquisite taste of TOUS les JOURS, an artisan bakery located in Princeton Junction. As a pioneer in the United States since 2004, TOUS les JOURS, meaning “everyday” in French, has become a beloved neighborhood bakery. Our passion lies in creating a unique selection of fresh bread, inspired by both French and Asian culinary traditions. At TOUS les JOURS, we are committed to sourcing the finest ingredients, ensuring the utmost freshness and quality in every bite.
